title: Looking for Cycle or Tolstoi Back
author: taul166

posts.post_title: Looking for Cycle or Tolstoi Back
posts.post_content:
Hi, I am looking to expand my back subset and realize I have neither a Cycle or Tolstoi back.

I am especially interested in PSA graded (2, 3, or 4) action poses.  

I have most portraits with a Piedmont or Sweet Caporal back so I do not want a duplicate portrait.

Thanks.

I have a PSA2 McGinnity Cycle 350. 
If interested PM me.

Good luck on your hunt

Sent from my SM-G960U using Tapatalk
